price: Алар – бейиш элдери! Жакшы амалдарына жараша эми анда түбөлүккө калышат!
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati khālidīna fīhā jazāan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
